root.name: AeroGauge
root.description: OverviewAerogauge is a futuristic racing game that is similar to games like Extreme G, HSX, or Wipeout. The game supports two players. One of the biggest difference between this game and the other futuristic racing games is than in Aero Gauge you fly instead of hover, so you can have more control over your ship. There are six tracks to race on.RacersThere are ten different racers to choose from:InterceptorHornetAvengerShredderBlack LightningVengeanceProwlerReaperDominatorN64 ControllerModes Grand Prix - First you must qualify, then race against the AI on four different courses.Single Match - Race on one course against the AI.Versus - Race head to head against a second person in split screen.Time Attack - Race alone and try to get the fastest time.
